# Unconventional Monetary Policy Spillover Effects

Since the Global Financial Crisis and the development of non-standard monetary measures, spillover effects from monetary policies in large advanced economies to emerging market economies (EME) have become the subject of considerable debate and a focal point of criticism from policy makers in EMEs.
